type: A Individual Person Service Review Related Website
detial: Developed a full-stack website in this way where it can detect the entrance of user and can show the result according to the user.
Users can view any services and give feedback. User also delete & update their feedback.
All the interaction information is saved in the database and is loaded from the database.
